text: The Mayor, on or before March 1 of each year, shall submit to the Council a report detailing the following:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 40-2004.1.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-201, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-701.

DC CODE § 50-704.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The total number of alternative-fuel vehicles purchased by the District in the previous fiscal year, by agency;
The total number of alternative-fuel vehicles owned by the District, by agency;
The total number of vehicles owned by the District, by agency;
The percentage of alternative-fuel vehicles, by agency;
A plan to purchase additional alternative-fuel vehicles in the upcoming fiscal year and subsequent fiscal years; and
A plan to comply with the purchase requirements mandated by this chapter.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)
